original_solution_mapping.L1: There are 5-1=<<5-1=4>>4 more lions each month.
original_solution_mapping.L2: There will be 4*12=<<4*12=48>>48 more lions after 1 year.
original_solution_mapping.L3: There were 148-48=<<148-48=100>>100 lions in Londolozi at first.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 206.
    Returns: the initial number of lions in Londolozi.
    """
    # L1
    cubs_born_per_month = 5 # 5 per month
    lions_die_per_month = 1 # 1 per month
    net_increase_per_month = cubs_born_per_month - lions_die_per_month

    # L2
    months_per_year = 12 # 1 year
    total_increase_per_year = net_increase_per_month * months_per_year

    # L3
    lions_after_one_year = 148 # 148 lions in Londolozi after 1 year
    initial_lions = lions_after_one_year - total_increase_per_year

    # FA
    answer = initial_lions
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: There are {cubs_born_per_month}-{lions_die_per_month}=<<{cubs_born_per_month}-{lions_die_per_month}={net_increase_per_month}>>{net_increase_per_month} more lions each month.
There will be {net_increase_per_month}*{months_per_year}=<<{net_increase_per_month}*{months_per_year}={total_increase_per_year}>>{total_increase_per_year} more lions after 1 year.
There were {lions_after_one_year}-{total_increase_per_year}=<<{lions_after_one_year}-{total_increase_per_year}={initial_lions}>>{initial_lions} lions in Londolozi at first.
